${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:TeddyBear.NAME: Teddy Bear
${modID}:TeddyBear.FLAVOR: A treasured toy that seems to respond to strong dreams.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time each turn that you draw a forgotten card, draw another card.

${modID}:SleepMobile.NAME: Sleep Mobile
${modID}:SleepMobile.FLAVOR: Looking at it gives you an odd sense of deja vu.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you remember a power card, shuffle a copy of that card into your deck.
